translation.Name: Audio Tape (Devante Dahmer #1)
translation.Description:
An audio tape diary.
Inspect To Play Audio Recording

"May 5th 2014. We tried to ‘ fix’ her, but it only made things worse. She's dead, and Zackery wants to harvest her completely now. It’s making us all question what his true goals are here exactly. What’s the point of any of this if we can’t bring everyone back? "
